snippet: “Market Warriors” is an amusing scrum in which four experts compete to see who can make the biggest profit by buying items at a flea market and reselling them at auction.
abstract: PBS television program Market Warriors follows the competitive world of flea-market shopping, with experts competing to see who can make the biggest profit buying items and reselling at auction.
lead_paragraph: “Market Warriors” is an amusing scrum in which four experts compete to see who can make the biggest profit by buying items at a flea market and reselling them at auction.

headline.seo: Bob Richter and Kevin Bruneau of ‘Market Warriors’ on PBS
headline.main: Panning for Gold Among All That Junk
headline.print_headline: Panning for Gold Among All That Junk
